Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class CharacterCardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.CharacterCardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class CharacterCardController extends Object implements GUIController
This class is the controller of the character card view.
